data.text:
Enhance your expertise with the FIBO Campus! ü§ì Where fitness and health professionals receive input for their daily work in sports and health facilities and learn about the latest scientific findings and trends in the industry. The FIBO Campus bundles all fee-based offers of the education programme in one ticket. Visitors have the opportunity to choose the right sessions for them and put together their own programme. üòä Enjoy exclusive access to FIBO Congress, a three-day event covering fitness, prevention, and health. Hosted by Deutsche Hochschule f√ºr Pr√§vention und Gesundheitsmanagement and BSA-Akademie, it offers practical insights into training, facility management, nutrition, mental fitness, corporate health management, and entrepreneurship from April 11 to 13. But that's not all! üòç FIBO Campus also hosts the Symposium on Sports Medicine and Physiotherapy, "when therapy becomes training" by Georg-Thieme-Verlag and sport√§rztezeitung thesportgroup exploring the dynamic intersection of therapy and training. Physiotherapists and sports physicians collaborate, sharing insights on mutual benefits. For physio enthusiasts, the Physio Summit by PHYSIO-DEUTSCHLAND, Deutscher Verband f√ºr Physiotherapie is your go-to for exchanging ideas and tips. üí° Save the date! üìÖ Friday is all about movement, with the Exercise is Medicine Summit. Dive into discussions led by top scientists, covering urban development, women's health, and the fascinating world of artificial intelligence. Good to know: FIBO Campus ticket includes FIBO entry. ‚ú®

FEBS-IUBMB-ENABLE 2024 Conference Registration has opened! The 3rd International FEBS-IUBMB-ENABLE Conference will be in Singapore, at the Lee Kong Chian School of Medicine at Nanyang Technological University (NTU). https://lnkd.in/gsu8ZjBD The FEBS-IUBMB-ENABLE conferences are international interdisciplinary events organized by and for young researchers (PhD students and postdocs) that bring together up to 300 participants worldwide. Biomedical sciences are the main focus of the event, with the critical role of AI in advancing biomedical and healthcare research highlighted this year: the scientific program will cover a broad range of topics, from metabolic diseases, population, and global health, to respiratory and infectious diseases, neuroscience and mental health, and skin disease and wound repair. In addition, the conference will have a Career Day with workshops, career chats with professionals, a job fair, and Outreach Activities in Singapore, to engage with the general public and give stakeholders a voice on biomedical discoveries. Early bird registration is now open. The application deadline for travel grants and short talks is 31 July. You can find the details on the registration page. https://lnkd.in/ena76BNU Watch this video: https://lnkd.in/eEWKi-Ve

Wasabi EU Project and Institut Technik und Bildung (ITB) ‚Äì University of Bremen ‚û°Ô∏è The Institut Technik und Bildung (ITB) of the University of Bremen focuses on VET (Vocational education and training) research with the subject areas of initial and continuing VET, and occupations and vocational training systems. ITB, in WASABI, is the leading partner for the development of learning concepts and media for human-AI collaboration, capitalizing on its scientific work and accumulated experience. Bremen University is also one of the SSH partner within the Wasabi project. Wasabi EU Project, coordinated by Carsa, is an EU-funded project that proposes digital intelligent assistance solutions based on üë©üèªüè≠üë®üèªüè≠ human-AI üß† collaboration and applied to the üè≠ manufacturing domain. ‚åõ Stay tuned for further announcements and details on how you can get involved in the upcoming opening of theüìûFirst Open Call. Don't miss out on the opportunity to be part of this groundbreaking initiative üëÄ. Meet our CONSORTIUM ‚¨áÔ∏è Carsa, BIBA - Bremer Institut f√ºr Produktion und Logistik GmbH, Universit√† degli Studi di Modena e Reggio Emilia, Syxis, SINTEF, TTTech, ATLANTIS Engineering SA, ICCS - NTUA , Mews Partners, Reinova S.p.a, REILab, KU Leuven, i-Deal srl, University of Bremen, TRIMEK SERVEIS METROLOGICS SL, Croma Gio. Batta Croma Gio. Batta, CROMA GIO BATTA ESPA√ëA SL, episcan.es, KLISBio, Innovalia Association This project has received funding from the Horizon Europe programme under the Grant Agreement No. 101092176 #digitalintelligentassistance #humanaicollaboration #knowledgetransfer #circulareconomy #artificialintelligence #europeanproject #horizoneurope

Since its inception in 1995, the DUPHAT_UAE conferences have evolved into globally acclaimed pharmaceutical events. Professionals, academicians, and experts have played a pivotal role in elevating DUPHAT's stature and recognition on the international stage. Esteemed organizations such as ASHP, EUFEPS, ESCP, SHPA LTD, ISPE, ESOP, International Association of Therapeutic Drug Monitoring and Clinical Toxicology (IATDMCT), ACPE inc, and others have consistently #supported and #patronized the #conference , fostering greater #collaboration and #cooperation. The continuous backing of the Dubai Health Authority has been instrumental in DUPHAT's ascent, solidifying its position as the premier #pharmaceutical #conference in the region. Click the link to watch the highlights: https://lnkd.in/dw6cU4xg #health #care #wellness #fitnessmotivation #fitnessfirst #medicine #hospitals #healthcare #pharmaceutical #technology #packaging #modern #government #events #movement #change #artificialintelligence #robotics #science #vaccination #pfizer #healthcare #patientcare #optimization

üåüMeet the Leaders Behind Our Pilot Project with PTSF: Jonasz Skrobek We're excited to introduce you to Jonasz Skrobek, one of the outstanding student leaders driving the AIDIFY pilot phase project in partnership with Polish Pharmaceutical Students‚Äô Association (Polskie Towarzystwo Student√≥w Farmacji-PTSF). If you are searching for talented individuals full of passion to develop themselves, you'll want to get acquainted with AIDIFY Pilot Leaders! üë©üéì About Jonasz Skrobek üéì University: Medical University of Silesia üéØ Why did you decide to participate in the Pilot Project: I am always ready to expand my knowledge and improve my skills that are relevant to my career. Using the AIDIFY platform is a great way for me to acquire not only theoretical knowledge but also practical skills that are crucial in today's competitive job market. üå± Career Goals: I aim to work as a project manager, mainly in oncology-related projects. üèÜ Achievements: Becoming Chairman of PTSF Sosnowiec Ambassador 2022/2023 AstraZeneca Poland internship at AstraZeneca Poland as a Diagnostic Project Manager Leader of the HELPERS' GENERATION DKMS campaign. Don't miss the chance to connect with future leaders in the pharmaceutical industry! Stay tuned for more profiles. #AIDIFY #PTSF #Leadership #PharmaIndustry #PilotProject #MeetTheLeaders

Introducing a #ConsortiumPartner from Romania - The Executive Agency for Higher Education, Research, Development and Innovation Funding - UEFISCDI. üîç UEFISCDI is an independent research funding agency in Romania, operating under the Ministry of Education and in close collaboration with the Ministry of Research, Innovation, and Digitalization. Their primary mission? To champion quality and leadership in higher education, research, development, and innovation. üéØ It has a long track record of implementing projects targeting higher education, science and innovation, professions and skills, research infrastructures, etc. üí° Engaging in the VELES project underscores UEFISCDI's dedication to advancing Research, Development, and Innovation (RDI) in health-related domains. Their involvement aims to contribute significantly to establishing a sustainable and impactful Smart Health Innovation Ecosystem in South-East Europe. In the #VELES project, UEFISCDI holds a crucial role, coordinating two key tasks: ‚úÖ Regional Smart Health Data Spaces Enablement and ‚úÖ Ecosystem‚Äôs Stakeholder Engagement and Long term common R&I and investment strategic agenda and action plan. #HealthInnovation #smarthealth #excellencehub #healthdataspace

üåç Join HiRO's "Trials Without Borders: Insights from Diverse Regions" webinar series! Over the next three months, we are thrilled to present a series of webinars that delve into the clinical trial landscape in six different regions: - Korea & Japan - Malaysia & Philippines - Mainland China - Taiwan & Hong Kong - Australia & New Zealand - United States Kicking off the series are our Korea and Japan teams. Our speakers, JiHee Noh, Ryosuke Endo and Tsukasa Kiriyama, will discuss the topic of "Tapping into East Asia: Maximizing Your Global Study Value through Korea & Japan." Date: July 12, 2024 (Friday) Time: 16:00-17:00 (GMT+9) Registration link: https://lnkd.in/gQCA2bYr Don't miss this opportunity to gain valuable knowledge and expand your global study capabilities. Register for free now! For any inquiries, please contact us at info@harvestiro.com. #ClinicalTrials #GlobalStudy #EastAsia #WebinarSeries #TrialsWithoutBorders #HiRO

üîµ CATALISI General Assembly highlights! On January 18th, the first CATALISI General Assembly took place at UJI in Castellon, Spain. It has been a day full of inspirational ideas and fruitful discussions! üöÄ The key results achieved so far and the next steps that partners will undertake in the upcoming months have been at the heart of the debate. Also, partners actively took part in several co-creation sessions contributing to a mutual and crucial exchange of best practices and perspectives between HEIs: üîπ In the workshop facilitated by ENoLL and AUTH, Higher Education Institutions (HEIs) collaboratively addressed challenges in co-creation and stakeholder engagement for institutional transformation, aiming to develop practical best practices. üîπ F6S ignited the conversation about the best practices to transform CATALISI‚Äôs efforts into exploitable results üîπ APRE guided the discussions on the development model that will be used by institution-to-institution partnerships and peer relationships to benefit both sides, as well as the future goals and achievements of the Community of Practice (CoP). These co-creation sessions marked an important milestone for them in the progress toward the peer-to-peer learning and in their pathway toward institutional transformation! Stay tuned and join our community for all upcoming news! #CATALISI #HigherEducationInstitutions #InnovationCommunity #CollaborationHub APRE - Agenzia per la Promozione della Ricerca Europea | EY | F6S Innovation | ENoLL (European Network of Living Labs) | Kaunas University of Technology | Universitat Jaume I | Luiss Guido Carli University | University of Gdansk | University College Cork | AUTH Medical Physics & Digital Innovation Lab | Amsterdam UMC
